oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Borylated Thiaporphyrin Building Blocks for the Synthesis of Unsymmetrical Phenyl-Bridged Porphyrin Dyads
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: YEDUKONDALU, M
RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: h bond activation
heterobimetallic complexes
arrays
assemblies
thiaporphyrins
borylation
building blocks
porphyrin dyads
energy transfer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: meso-(4-Borylphenyl)thiaporphyrin building blocks with N(3)S and N(2)S(2) porphyrin cores have been synthesized using two different approaches and used for the synthesis of meso-meso- and beta-meso-1,4-phenylene-bridged unsymmetrical porphyrin dyads containing two different porphyrin subunits.
